aboutSection.title: Yapıtek ANKA Construction
aboutSection.subtitle: A Future Built on Trust
aboutSection.description: Since 2014, Yapıtek ANKA Construction has been active in construction, real estate, energy, and international trade prioritizing trust, quality, and sustainability in every project it delivers. Beyond constructing durable buildings, Yapıtek designs energy-efficient, environmentally conscious, and technologically integrated living spaces, securing a distinguished position within the sector.

imageComparisonSlider.title: evart oran - ankara
imageComparisonSlider.description: Evart Oran is a distinguished project where modern living and comfort meet in the heart of Ankara. Located in one of the city’s most prestigious areas, the project stands out with its contemporary architectural approach while offering a sustainable, eco-friendly living environment. With expansive green landscapes, modern social facilities, and advanced technological infrastructure, Evart Oran elevates the quality of life to the highest level.

imageComparisonSliderReverse.title: evart yalıkavak - bodrum
imageComparisonSliderReverse.description: Evart Yalıkavak is a luxury residential project located in one of Bodrum’s most sought-after locations, positioned directly on the seafront. Overlooking the enchanting Aegean landscape, this exclusive development stands out with its modern architectural design and premium living spaces. With expansive terraces, a private beach, and world-class social amenities, Evart Yalıkavak offers the lifestyle you’ve always imagined.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: Since 2014, Yapıtek ANKA Construction has been active in construction, real estate, energy, and international trade prioritizing trust, quality, and sustainability in every project it delivers. Beyond constructing durable buildings, Yapıtek designs energy-efficient, environmentally conscious, and technologically integrated living spaces, securing a distinguished position within the sector.
about.paragraph2: In the energy field, the company contributes to Turkey’s infrastructure with directional drilling and field installations, while its strong import–export network enables it to play an influential role in global markets. Yapıtek seamlessly blends engineering expertise with a forward-looking international vision.
about.paragraph3: Evart – More Than a Structure, A Way of Living
about.paragraph4: Born from Yapıtek’s engineering experience, the Evart brand was created not merely to develop construction projects, but to craft lifestyle concepts that unite aesthetics, functionality, and investment value. In every development, Evart harmonizes the spirit of its city with contemporary architecture, aiming to offer residents “not just a home, but a way of life.”
about.paragraph6: Located in Ankara’s prestigious Çankaya district, neighboring embassies and the urban core, it offers a refined residential experience. With its modern residence concept, high rental potential, and flexible apartment typologies, it offers both strong living comfort and investment value.
about.paragraph8: As Bodrum’s first residence-style development, it blends the city’s vibrant atmosphere with the tranquility of the sea and nature. Its garden and rooftop duplexes, social living areas, and professional investment model create a uniquely distinguished concept in Turkey.
about.paragraph9: While Yapıtek ANKA Construction represents strength and reliability, the Evart brand crowns this foundation with aesthetic vision, innovative architecture, and a strong investment mindset.Thanks to this synergy, Evart projects not only meet today’s expectations but also shape the living standards of the future.

evartOran.title: Evart Oran
evartOran.description: Evart Oran is more than a residential project; it is the embodiment of a vision that builds the living standards of the future today. Located in Çankaya Oran—surrounded by embassies and prestigious institutions—the project stands out with its modern architecture, strong rental potential, and solid investment value.

section1.title: Lifestyle:
section1.subtitle: urban & Prestigious
section1.description:
Situated in one of Ankara’s most distinguished districts, Evart Oran blends the city’s dynamism with elevated living standards.

• 1+1 and 2+1 flexible apartment options → designed for diverse lifestyles
• Modern residence concept → spacious, functional, and refined living
• Proximity to universities, shopping centers, and social venues → effortless urban life

With a location just 5 minutes from Atakule, 1 minute from Kuzu Effect Mall, and 10 minutes from METU, Evart Oran is an ideal choice for young professionals, diplomats, academics, and investors alike.

section2.title: Social Spaces:
section2.subtitle: Comfort & Security
section2.description:
Evart Oran is not limited to private residences—it shines with thoughtfully curated common areas that enhance quality of life:

• Indoor parking & advanced security systems
• Landscape design that complements modern architecture
• Communal spaces that encourage connection and neighborhood culture

section3.title: Investment Opportunities:
section3.subtitle: Powered by Location
section3.description:
Çankaya Oran is one of Ankara’s fastest-appreciating neighborhoods.

• High rental income potential
• Strategic advantage of being in the embassy zone
• An investment model that generates returns in the short term and preserves value in the long term

section4.title: Living + Investment:
section4.subtitle: Dual Advantage
section4.description: Evart Oran offers a peaceful lifestyle to its residents while providing strong value to its investors. Flexible apartment typologies and its extremely central location open the door to a secure investment with long-term potential.

section5.title: A Life
section5.subtitle: Immersed in Art
section5.description:
At Evart Oran, life goes beyond architecture—art becomes a natural part of daily living. The project hosts:

• Walkable terraces
• Open and closed art studios
• Artist-in-residence spaces used periodically
• A gallery-inspired exhibition concept

All crafted to offer an inspiring ambiance for residents and visitors.
Special workshop areas designed for children support artistic development across many disciplines—from painting and ceramics to digital arts and sculpture. At Evart Oran, creativity is central at every age.

section6.title: 360° Comfort with
section6.subtitle: Smart Home Systems
section6.description:
All residences in Evart Oran are equipped with fully integrated smart home technologies designed to enhance comfort and security.
With a single touch or via mobile app, residents can control:

• Lighting
• Heating & cooling
• Security & camera integrations
• Smart lock system
• Curtain & shutter automation
• Energy-efficiency tracking

Smart home infrastructure not only elevates daily living but also increases long-term property value. Here, technology, design, and functionality merge seamlessly.

evartYalikavak.title: Evart Yalıkavak

banner.title: Where the energy of the city
banner.subtitle: Meets the spirit of Bodrum

evartYalikavak.description: As Bodrum’s first true residence-style development, Evart Yalıkavak offers not just a living space, but an entirely new way of life. Blending traditional Bodrum architecture with a contemporary urban approach, the project promises both a rewarding investment model and a privileged lifestyle experience.

section1.title: Lifestyle:
section1.subtitle: Urban & Serene
section1.description:
Here, you’re not just owning an apartment; you’re embracing a unique minimal lifestyle that blends the pace of the city with the calm spirit of Bodrum. Comprising a total of 132 units, this project introduces a refined, functional and socially engaging way of living in Bodrum.

While the garden duplexes open directly to the pool the moment you wake up, the roof duplexes offer the airy comfort of a modern residence with their high ceilings.

Each unit is designed as a gross 40 m² compact yet functional 1+1 layout. Thanks to modular architecture, units can be combined to create larger and more flexible living environments.

section2.title: Social Spaces:
section2.subtitle: The Art of Living Together
section2.description:
At Evart Yalıkavak, common areas are not an afterthought they are the heart of daily life:

• Central pool: A place to cool off by day, connect and socialize by night.
• Expansive social garden: Morning coffees, evening conversations, and new friendships all flourish here.
• Indoor parking: Providing both convenience and security.

section3.title: Investment Opportunities:
section3.subtitle: Live While You Earn
section3.description:
Evart Yalıkavak is located in one of Bodrum’s highest rental-yield regions.

• Professional rental management
• Transparent income model with centralized control
• Accelerated investment return through short-term tourist rentals

While the average ROI in Bodrum is 12 years, at Evart Yalıkavak this can decrease to 6–10 years with touristic rentals.

section4.title: Living + Investment:
section4.subtitle: Dual Value
section4.description:
All units are delivered with commercial deed titles, allowing you full flexibility:
Use your property as a home, an office, or a pure investment asset. Combined with the rise of home-office culture, Evart Yalıkavak becomes a versatile and high-value investment opportunity.
